de.psi.efload.packerapi
Interface PackageSet

All Known Subinterfaces:
TourTransport
All Known Implementing Classes:
IMLTourTransport, TestPackageSet, TestTourTransport
public interface PackageSet

Defines a number of packages of the same type.

Author:
kschroeder

Method Summary
 PackageSet divide(int packageCount)
          Creates a new set by dividing the package count of this set into two fractions.
 int getPackageCount()
          Returns the number of packages.
 java.lang.String getPackageSetID()
          Returns an external identifier for this package set
 PackageType getPackageType()
          Returns the type of the packages.
 boolean isDividable()
          Returns a flag which determines if this set is allowed to be divided.
 boolean merge(PackageSet packageSet)
          Tries to merge another package set into this set.

getPackageType

PackageType getPackageType()

isDividable

boolean isDividable()
Returns a flag which determines if this set is allowed to be divided.

Returns:
The dividable flag.

divide

PackageSet divide(int packageCount)
Creates a new set by dividing the package count of this set into two fractions.

Preconditions:

  • isDividable() returns true.
  • The specified new package count is greater than zero.
  • The specified new package count is less than the original package count.

Parameters:
packageCount - The package count of the new transport.
Returns:
A copy of this transport containing the specified package count.

merge

boolean merge(PackageSet packageSet)
Tries to merge another package set into this set. This reverses the effect of divide(int). This may fail if the merged set is not compatible with this set.

Parameters:
packageSet - The package set to be merged.
Returns:
true on success, false on failure.
